attributes.action: Block "IS School girl" Shamima Begum from returning to the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details: Shamima Begum must not be allowed back into the United Kingdom as she is openly supporting terrorism & will be a financial burden to the country & her local authority.
attributes.background: Shamima Begum fled the United Kingdom with 2 other friends in 2015 to illegally travel to Syria to join the Islamic State, She has previously spoken about how beheadings do not faze her & now wants to return to the United Kingdom claiming it's for fear of her unborn child
